ResourceHeader.ResourceName: CNA measured at 2sec intervals with the broad-beam riometer at Aedey, Iceland.
ResourceHeader.Description: Cosmic Noise Absorption (CNA) measured at 2sec intervals with the broad-beam riometer at Aedey, Iceland. The data is stored together with the magnetic field from the fluxgate magnetometer and the magnetic field from the induction magnetometer.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact the Principal Investigator, Dr. Hisao Yamagishi (yamagisi [at] uap.nipr.ac.jp), National Institute of Polar Research (NIPR) before using the data at any publications and/or presentations. We welcome collaborative research and strongly recommend users to contact us early in order to ensure that the data are suitable for their research. When the data are used at any publications and/or presentations, we would like to ask the users to acknowledge NIPR and send us one copy of the reprints. An example of the acknowledgement statement is as follows: "Riometer data were provided by National Institute of Polar Research, Japan."

AccessURL.Name: Conjugate Observation between Syowa Station and Iceland
